scripts.dev:shared: pnpm --filter @asafarim/shared-ui-react build && pnpm --filter @asafarim/helper start && pnpm --filter @asafarim/shared-validation build && pnpm --filter @asafarim/shared-logging build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,blog,core,ai,identity,tasks,testora,smartops,smartpath,kc,rms,studynotes -c "blue,magenta,cyan,green,yellow,orange,red,purple,teal,ultraviolet" "pnpm dev:web" "pnpm dev:blog" "pnpm dev:core" "pnpm dev:ai" "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm dev:tasks" "pnpm dev:testora" "pnpm dev:smartops" "pnpm dev:smartpath" "pnpm dev:kc" "pnpm dev:rms" "pnpm dev:studynotes"
scripts.devWeb: concurrently -n identity,web,ai,core -c "blue,magenta,yellow,green" "pnpm dev:identity"  "pnpm dev:web" "pnpm dev:ai" "pnpm dev:core"
scripts.api:build: concurrently -n ai,identity,core,tasks,testora,testrunner,smartops,smartpath,kc,rms,studynotes -c "blue,magenta,yellow,orange,green,purple,red,teal,purple" "pnpm api:ai:build" "pnpm api:identity:build" "pnpm api:core:build" "pnpm api:tasks:build" "pnpm api:smartops:build" "pnpm api:testora:build" "pnpm api:testrunner:build" "pnpm api:rms:build" "pnpm api:studynotes:build" "pnpm api:kc:build"
scripts.api: concurrently -n ai,identity,core,tasks,testora,testrunner,smartops,smartpath,kc,studynotes -c "blue,magenta,yellow,orange,green,purple,red,teal,purple" "pnpm api:ai" "pnpm api:identity" "pnpm api:core" "pnpm api:tasks" "pnpm api:testora" "pnpm api:testrunner" "pnpm api:smartops" "pnpm api:smartpath" "pnpm api:kc" "pnpm api:studynotes"
scripts.app: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev" "pnpm api"
scripts.app:build: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && concurrently "pnpm app:ai:build" "pnpm app:core:build" "pnpm app:tasks:build" "pnpm app:jobs:build" "pnpm app:identity:build" "pnpm app:blog:build" "pnpm app:smartops:build" "pnpm app:testora:build" "pnpm app:web:build"
scripts.app:identity: pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity"
scripts.app:ai: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity" "pnpm dev:ai" "pnpm api:ai"
scripts.app:core: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity"  "pnpm dev:core" "pnpm api:core"
scripts.app:jobs: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity" "pnpm dev:jobs" "pnpm api:jobs"
scripts.app:blog: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm app:identity" "pnpm dev:blog"
scripts.app:smartops: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm app:identity" "pnpm dev:core" "pnpm api:core" "pnpm dev:smartops" "pnpm api:smartops"
scripts.app:smartpath: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm app:identity" "pnpm dev:core" "pnpm api:core" "pnpm dev:smartpath" "pnpm api:smartpath"
scripts.app:testora: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm app:identity" "pnpm dev:testora" "pnpm api:testora" "pnpm api:testrunner"
scripts.app:tasks: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm app:identity" "pnpm dev:core" "pnpm api:core" "pnpm dev:tasks" "pnpm api:tasks"
scripts.app:studynotes: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity" "pnpm dev:core" "pnpm api:core" "pnpm dev:studynotes" "pnpm api:studynotes"
scripts.app:kc: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity" "pnpm dev:kc" "pnpm api:kc"
